alert.note: Alert for Belknap; Coastal Rockingham; Eastern Hillsborough; Interior Rockingham; Merrimack; Strafford (New Hampshire) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Watch issued January 08 at 3:55AM EST until January 10 at 12:00PM EST by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: ...FLOOD WATCH IN EFFECT FROM TUESDAY EVENING THROUGH WEDNESDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall and snow melt is possible. * WHERE...Portions of Maine, including the following areas, Central Interior Cumberland, Coastal Cumberland, Coastal York, Interior York and Sagadahoc and New Hampshire, including the following areas, Belknap, Coastal Rockingham, Eastern Hillsborough, Interior Rockingham, Merrimack, Strafford and Western And Central Hillsborough. * WHEN...From Tuesday evening through Wednesday afternoon. * IMPACTS...Flooding may occur in poor drainage and urban areas. Storm drains and ditches may become clogged with snow and other debris.
info.instruction: You should monitor the latest forecast and be alert for possible Flood Warnings. Now is the time to prepare by clearing snow from drains. Those living in areas prone to flooding should be prepared to take action should flooding develop.

area.areaDesc: Belknap; Coastal Rockingham; Eastern Hillsborough; Interior Rockingham; Merrimack; Strafford
